official_title: To provide for a research project in the Salton Sea area of Southern California regarding an enhanced evaporation system for saline water.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct, through the Bureau of Reclamation, a research project for the development of an enhanced evaporation system for saline water treatment in the area of the Salton Sea of Southern California. Sets the non-Federal share of the cost at 25 percent. Requires a report to the Congress on project results. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: To provide for a research project in the Salton Sea area of Southern California regarding an enhanced evaporation system for saline water.
